QuestData.Title: Recovering Remnants
QuestData.Description:
Scan of area indicates roaming spirits clad in armor plating. Purpose: defense of structure, animated by corruption.
Detecting remnants of titan plating within spirits' armor. Request: recover remnants.
Titan Keeper Hezrel capable of breaking down titan plating to reforge into weapon against forces drawn by corruption.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover $1oa Titan Plating from Nazwathan Spectres.
